.fa:hover{color:#e74c3c}#footer .footer--bottom .footer-container .footer-copyright{color:#6a6a6a}#footer .footer-socialmedia{opacity:0;transform:translateX(60%);-webkit-transform:translateX(60%);-moz-transform:translateX(60%);-ms-transform:translateX(60%);-o-transform:translateX(60%);transition:transform 2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1) .2s;-webkit-transition:transform 2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1) .2s;-moz-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);-ms-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);-o-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);will-change:transform}#footer .footer-socialmedia.visible{transform:none;-webkit-transform:none;-moz-transform:none;-ms-transform:none;-o-transform:none;opacity:1}#contact{margin-bottom:4rem;background-color:#f4f5f9;overflow:hidden}#contact .heading-tertiary{color:#e74c3c;margin-bottom:1.7rem}#contact p{color:#999;margin-bottom:3.5rem}#contact .contact--wrapper{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-flow:row wrap}#contact .contact-box{box-shadow:0 .1rem .5rem #999;-webkit-box-shadow:0 .1rem .5rem #999;padding:5rem;background:#fff;min-height:40rem}@media (max-width:37.5em){#contact .contact-box{width:100%;margin:0 0 1rem!important;flex:none!important}}#contact .contact-box--left{flex:1;margin-right:2.5rem}#contact .contact-box--right{flex:3}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form input,#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea{display:block;width:100%;padding:1rem 0;margin-bottom:2rem;border:none;border-bottom:1px solid #999;outline:none;font-size:inherit;font-family:inherit;color:#999;transition:all .3s;-webkit-transition:all .3s;-moz-transition:all .3s;-ms-transition:all .3s;-o-transition:all .3s}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form input:focus,#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea:focus{border-bottom:1px solid #e74c3c}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form input::placeholder,#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea::placeholder{color:#999}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form input:-ms-input-placeholder,#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#999}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form input::-ms-input-placeholder,#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea::-ms-input-placeholder{color:#999}#contact .contact-box--right .contact-form textarea{min-height:9rem}#contact .contact-box--right .contact__btn{background:#6a6a6a;z-index:1}#contact .contact--wrapper .contact-box{transition:transform 2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1) .2s;-webkit-transition:transform 2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1) .2s;-moz-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);-ms-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);-o-transition:transform 2s .2s cubic-bezier(0,1,.3,1);will-change:transform}#contact .contact--wrapper .contact-box:nth-child(odd){opacity:0;transform:translateX(-60%);-webkit-transform:translateX(-60%);-moz-transform:translateX(-60%);-ms-transform:translateX(-60%);-o-transform:translateX(-60%)}#contact .contact--wrapper .contact-box:nth-child(2n){opacity:0;transform:translateX(60%);-webkit-transform:translateX(60%);-moz-transform:translateX(60%);-ms-transform:translateX(60%);-o-transform:translateX(60%)}#contact .contact--wrapper.visible .contact-box{transform:none;-webkit-transform:none;-moz-transform:none;-ms-transform:none;-o-transform:none;opacity:1}
